definition: Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while

sentences.english: Michelle Syrah form the heart of this basket.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔西拉形式的心脏这篮子里。

sentences.english: He was staring at the Place Saint-Michel.
sentences.chinese: 他瞪眼看着米歇尔广场。

sentences.english: When Michele offered to help with the funeral arrangements, Dave could not thank her enough.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔主动提出帮助安排丧事，戴维感激得不得了。

sentences.english: It also delves into her roles in the presidential campaign and in the White House.
sentences.chinese: 文章还分析了米歇尔在总统竞选和白宫中扮演的角色。

sentences.english: Philipp took on the role solely because Michael was injured.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普只是因为米歇尔受伤了才接任队长的。

sentences.english: Michelle Rhee created the IMPACT system.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔李承晚创造了影响系统。

sentences.english: He approached her one evening at the Café du Relais Saint-Michel.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上他在圣米歇尔海滩咖啡馆朝她走过去。

sentences.english: I like the programme hosted by Michelle.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢米歇尔主持的节目。

sentences.english: His lawyer wife, Michelle, had been a high-paid hospital executive.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子米歇尔一直担任薪酬丰厚的医院院长。

sentences.english: He and his wife, Michelle, arrived at the White House 14 minutes early.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的妻子米歇尔提前了14分钟到达了白宫。

sentences.english: Michele marveled that Mac was still standing.
sentences.chinese: 让米歇尔称奇的是，麦克竟然还能“站得住”。

sentences.english: The hotel is a very convenient place to stay if you are visiting Mont Saint-Michel.
sentences.chinese: 入住这家酒店可方便您游览圣米歇尔山。

sentences.english: Michelle Malkin is joining us right now.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔马尔金现在加入我们。

sentences.english: Messier used to have the nickname ' J2M'.
sentences.chinese: 管理风格米歇尔曾有个昵称，叫‘j2m’。

sentences.english: “The heart always has room to love another, ”Michele assured him.
sentences.chinese: “多爱一个人总还是可以的，”米歇尔让他放下心来。

sentences.english: He also has a reputation for revelling in the power and glamour his position brings.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔好炫耀地位给他带来的权势和风光也是有名的。
